title: Plat 1 Mid main LF duo buddy to climb to diamond

embed.description: Create & discover new Champion builds/strategies, check your Summoner statistics and try our powerful LoL charts.

body:
I recently just dropped from p1 due to some really unlucky games to p3 and want to just climb out to diamond before end of season so im looking for a skilled consistant player to duo with since it will be easier so we can carry to diamond dont have to have voice comm but preffered :D looking for some good laughs too

p3+ any role


add me in game

replies.body: I'm a plat 2 (almost 1) jungle main. I sent you a request so we can talk about details if you're interested
